# PngMetadata.GetIndexAfter method

Gets the index after the last chunk with any of the specified types.

```csharp
public int GetIndexAfter(IEnumerable<ChunkType> chunkTypes)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| chunkTypes | The types of the chunks to find. |

## Return Value

Returns the index after the last chunk with any of the specified types, or `0` if none were found.
